channel.title: I wanna make a handler for my added objects
channel.description: i DO wanna do that, but meh.. not sure on making handlers yet can any1 help me do that? if u tell me how to properly put my added objects in it and take out of client, id apeciate that much too lol

item.title: I wanna make a handler for my added objects
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Learn about object oriented programming and it would be extremely simple to implement. Make sure your constructor for the class contains references to what stream you are creating objects from.

Read full topic
